quests.passage: Despite investing heavily in marketing, the product received poor reviews and sales dropped.
options: Marketing alone cannot save a bad product

quests.passage: Countries that invest in education tend to have higher GDP and lower poverty rates.
The experiment was repeated five times with the same result each time.
Overuse of antibiotics has led to the rise of drug-resistant bacteria.
options: Responsible use of antibiotics is important
quests.hint: What is the consequence of overuse?

quests.passage: Workers who take regular breaks report higher productivity and lower stress levels.
options: Stress is not related to breaks
